body.bibl: Assemani, Joseph Simonius. Bibliotheca Orientalis Clementino-Vaticana, in qua Manuscriptos Codices Syriacos, Arabicos, Persicos, Turcicos, Hebraicos, Samaritanos, Armenicos, Æthiopicos, Græcos, Ægyptiacos, Ibericos & Malabaricos. 3 vols. Roma: Typis Sacrae Congregationis de Propaganda Fide, 1719.

Joseph Simonius Assemani, Bibliotheca Orientalis Clementino-Vaticana, in qua Manuscriptos Codices Syriacos, Arabicos, Persicos, Turcicos, Hebraicos, Samaritanos, Armenicos, Æthiopicos, Græcos, Ægyptiacos, Ibericos & Malabaricos, 3 vols. (Roma: Typis Sacrae Congregationis de Propaganda Fide, 1719).
